Rest: Get plenty of rest to allow your body to fight off the infection.
Humidifiers: Use a humidifier to add moisture to the air, which can help relieve congestion.
Saline nasal sprays: Use a saline nasal spray to help loosen mucus and make it easier to blow your nose.
Over-the-counter pain relievers: Take over-the-counter pain relievers like acetaminophen or ibuprofen to help reduce fever and alleviate aches and pains.
Eucalyptus oil: Use eucalyptus oil in a diffuser or apply it to your chest to help open airways and relieve congestion.
